milestones: Understand Python syntax and basic programming concepts
Develop simple programs using Python and familiarize with libraries
Complete a small project that incorporates learned skills

dailyTasks.title: Introduction to Python
dailyTasks.description: Learn Python basics including variables, data types, and control structures (if statements, loops). Complete at least 5 exercises.

dailyTasks.title: Working with Data Structures
dailyTasks.description: Dive into lists, dictionaries, and functions. Practice by creating functions that manipulate these data structures. Complete at least 5 exercises.

dailyTasks.title: Develop a Small Project
dailyTasks.description: Choose a simple project (e.g., a calculator or a to-do list) and implement it using the concepts learned. Document your code and prepare for a presentation.

successMetrics: Successfully complete at least 15 Python exercises across three days
Build and demonstrate a functional small project by the end of day 3
challenges: Absorbing a large amount of information in a short time
Maintaining motivation during the learning process
plan.motivationalApproach: Set small achievable goals for each task and reward yourself with breaks or small treats after completing each day's tasks. Remind yourself of the benefits of learning Python and visualize how you will use it in future projects.

milestones: Learn about DOM manipulation and events
Build a small interactive web application

dailyTasks.title: JavaScript Basics
dailyTasks.description: Learn about data types, variables, and operators in JavaScript.

dailyTasks.title: Control Structures
dailyTasks.description: Study conditionals (if, switch) and loops (for, while).

dailyTasks.title: Functions and Scope
dailyTasks.description: Understand how to declare functions, scope, and closures.

dailyTasks.title: Objects and Arrays
dailyTasks.description: Learn about objects, arrays, and methods to manipulate them.

dailyTasks.title: DOM Manipulation
dailyTasks.description: Explore how to access and modify HTML elements with JavaScript.

dailyTasks.title: Events and Listeners
dailyTasks.description: Learn about handling user events like clicks and form submissions.

dailyTasks.title: Build a Simple App
dailyTasks.description: Create a small interactive web application using the skills learned.

successMetrics: Complete all daily tasks on time
Build a functional interactive web application
challenges: Time management - keeping up with daily tasks
Understanding complex concepts like closures and asynchronous JS
plan.motivationalApproach: Set daily rewards for completing tasks, such as taking breaks or enjoying a treat. Keep a progress journal to track learning and celebrate small wins.
